attributes.action: The UK must stop supporting Kabila's Dictatorial government  in the DRCONGO
attributes.additional_details:
We want to ask the UK to stop supporting the dictatorial governement of Kabila in the DR CONGO.
Congolese people have rejected Kabila an incompetent dictatorial opportunist and an oppressor who has brought the country to its knees. he violation human rights and should not be supported by the UK.
